did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY

persname.normal: [give the MARC presentation of creator here, i.e., surname first; include dates]

did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Correspondence and subject files relating to Hagan's professional career, with reference to the American Veterinary Association, the Society of American Bacteriologists, and other professional organizations.

bioghist.head: BIOGRAPHICAL NOTE
bioghist.p: William Arthur Hagan was a professor of Veterinary Bacteriology, and the fourth Dean of the New York State College of Veterinary Medicine. His term ran from 1932-1959.

controlaccess.head: Names:
controlaccess.corpname: New York State College of Veterinary Medicine.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: William A. Hagan papers, #24-1-482. Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library.
